occupation: Principal Developer Advocate, Data Engineering and Analytics at Amazon Web Services (AWS)
headline: Transforming lazily, Data Engineering @ Amazon Web Services
summary:
•	Previously worked as Technical Lead focusing on QA, Automation, Performance and Tool Development efforts towards the NVMe Over Fabrics engineering solution.
•	Worked as a Staff Engineer for Broadcom with the Performance Benchmarking and Technical Marketing group
•	CompTIA Storage+ SME, responsible to develop the question set for the SNIA Certified Storage Professional certification examination. 
•	Storage Professional, mostly focusing on Performance Engineering, System Testing, Quality Engineering and Solutioning. Worked with clients to evaluate technologies. Conduct Assessments/ Workshops/PoC, provide solution architecture
•	Storage and system performance engineer, focusing on raw and application based performance benchmarking (like Oracle, MS SQL Server, MS Exchange Server, Storage Migration, Bootstrom, etc.) 
•	Storage QE professional, expertise on system, regression and performance testing for various storage systems, especially on distributed storage systems, like IBM SVC and EMC VPLEX
•	Leveraged open source tools, like Vagrant, Ansible and Docker to improve the test efficiency 
•	Expertise in delivering technical training & workshops (EMC VPLEX, IBM SVC, IBM V7000 Storwize, Customized Workshop)
•	Author of more than 30 white papers, published for Broadcom, IBM and Hitachi Data Systems
•	Frequent speaker at various national and international conference like, SNIA, GHCI and PyConf 
•	Developed Performance Monitoring tool for Brocade FC switches 
•	Developed Tool for Measuring VM Bootstorm performance benchmarking 
•	Github - https://github.com/suman-d

experiences.title: Principal Developer Advocate, Data Engineering and Analytics
Principal, Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS)
Principal Developer Advocate
experiences.description:
Worked with the Global Developer Relations Team, focusing on core services, serverless and machine learning.
•	Hosted 120+ third party conference and meetups in last 2 years focusing on various technology stack around Serverless, Machine Learning and Data Analysis. 
•	Presented at Tier 1 AWS events like re:Invent, AWS Innovate, AWS Modern Application Development, Amazon AI Innovate, AWS DevDay, etc. Hosted “AWS on Air” show at re:Invent. 
•	Developed developer focused content around Machine Learning and Serverless. 
•	Scaled the number of AWS User Group from 17 to 28 within two year in the region(India/SL/Bangladesh)

experiences.title: Project Leader
experiences.description:
Lead the Performance QA, Quality Engineering efforts for Toshiba NVMe over Fabric(KumoScale) Engineering solution 
•	Mentor new hire and train the team with the technology and product 
•	Developed performance regression testing suite and reporting dashboard
•	Developed automated test suit for REST API 
•	Performance benchmarking for various data center application (stand-alone and container based)
•	Performing POC and Demos on NVMeoF solution and Docker/Kubernetes
•	Participating as a speaker at various conferences like Flash Memory Summit, PyCon, SNIA, OpenSource for you, etc. 
•	Develop technical content wiki, white-papers and solution briefs

experiences.title: Principal Performance Engineer
experiences.description:
Worked with the Performance Engineering and Technical Marketing Group (Emulex Business Unit) focusing on FC HBA performance
characterization, PoC and benchmarking with various Flash Storage Systems.
•	Industry Performance Benchmarking – TPC-H, TPC-C and SPECsfs
•	Performance characterization of various workload for 8Gb, 16Gb and 32Gb FC cards
•	Benchmarking for FC card’s QoS(Quality of Service)
•	Writing blogs/technical performance brief papers for Engineering, Support and Product Marketing
•	Performance Benchmarking for SQL Server 2016 database with FC HBAs
•	Performance Benchmarking for Storage Migration(HyperV, ESX, and Citrix) over FC for the Gen6 32Gbps HBA adapters
•	Benchmarking/PoC for various flash arrays from different vendors, like, Dell, EMC, Violin, XtremIO, Kaminario, Pure, Nimble, etc.

experiences.title: Member of Technical Staff
experiences.description:
Worked with the Performance Products Group (PPG) focusing on validation and verification of various NetApp products.
•	Validating Service Processor security aspects for encryption(FIPS Qualification)
•	Performance Analysis for various workload, OLTP, DSS, etc. 
•	Performance Regression test design
•	Work with the Information Engineering team for field documents

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Worked for EMC Private Cloud workforce with VPLEX Engineering.
•	System testing for features, failure, DR for VPLEX 
•	Design, development and writing of system test case for core features and regression.
•	Customer Demos showcasing HA and Continuous Availability with VPLEX
•	Drive scoping of overall test effort for various new functionalities in a release and assist functional team leads for test scoping in their individual areas
•	Provide technical whiteboard sessions to engineering team on critical functionalities in the product
•	Adhere to SCRUM process during the product development phase
•	Focusing on IO Performance Regression efforts for VPLEX for different releases
•	Regression bisection and performance defect triage
•	Benchmark and performance characterization of different VPLEX configurations

experiences.title: Storage Solution Architect
experiences.description:
Worked with the Storage Lab Services, India System and Technology Lab (ISTL) which comes under the umbrella of India Software Lab (ISL), IBM

•	Designing and testing of various IBM System Virtualization Storage solution for arrays, like SVC and V7000.
•	Designing of complex SAN environment for various clients and providing them training on various IBM System Storage products, upcoming technologies, certifications, etc.
•	Designing and testing of Disaster Recovery Solution with various Replication Technologies
•	Bandwidth Calculation Tool Development of Disaster Recovery solutions
•	Performance Assessment of Storage Environment and Storage Health Check Assessment
•	Multiple projects handled for System and Technology Group (STG), GTS (including SO), GBS ranging from architecture, assessments, performance engineering, Offering development, Technical Project Management and customized STG trainings.
•	Collaborate with all Services teams (GTS, GBS, SWG Lab Services and our IBM Business Partners) in the optimal deployment of IBM® STG solutions
•	Conducting training on upcoming technologies, IBM System Storage, IBM Certifications, etc. to different clients and business partners.  
•	Define and develop Document of Understand(DoU) and Scope of Work(SoW) before the start of any engagement

experiences.title: Performance Consultant
experiences.description:
Worked for HITACHI Data Systems (HDS) with the Global Solution Strategy and Development Team as a Performance Consultant

•	Benchmark raw/application performance testing on HDS Modular Storage
•	Author of 20+ HDS performance best practice and white paper (ESRP-Exchange 2007/2010) for HDS Sales.
•	Trained Microsoft Exchange Rangers and designed 10+ Exchange Storage Solutions. 
•	Received Hitachi Data Systems Hat’s Off Award in April’2010.
•	Fulltime SNIA Corporate Member(Vendor Large Voting Membership)

accomplishment_projects.title: CompTIA Storage+ Powered by SNIA Storage Exam Development
accomplishment_projects.description: The team participated in the development of the Storage+ certification exam. Members developed questions for exam question bank; reviewed and revised existing questions from the bank, and provided input to CompTIA/SNIA regarding the overall content of the exam.
